skins.selfIntroduction: Back then, I wasn't able to fulfill my duties, but... Commander, this time, I'll show you what I'm capable of!
skins.acquisition: Eh? Who are you... Ah! Right, you're the Commander! I'm the L'Adroit-class destroyer, Le Mars! A pleasure meetin' you!
skins.login: Commander, you finally made it! What's on the training regimen today?
skins.details: To be honest, I'm a little jealous of Forbin. Back then, we both weren't able to move, but she made more of the situation than me...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, I'll teach you some stretches for those long days!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Being a commander sure is tough, isn't it? Having to micromanage this and that... My head would start spinning...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Studying just isn't my strong suit... I obviously can read all these words, but they just don't make any sense to me when put together...
skins.secretaryTouch: My shoulders were starting to get stiff too... Thanks a ton, Commander!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Th-this place also needs a massage? Um... it feels a little strange...

skins.shipDescription: Retro~ fit~ com~ plete! The new and improved Le Mars is at your service~!
skins.acquisition: Retro~ fit~ com~ plete! The new and improved Le Mars is at your service~!
skins.login: My torpedoes and cannons are locked and loaded! Commander, I'm ready to sortie at any time!
skins.details: Commander, are you that desperate to see my gallant form as I unload all my cannons and torpedo tubes? Ehehe, what am I going to do with you~
skins.secretaryIdle1: Hehe! Commander, is this victory pose cool? I saw it in an anime!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commission or sortie, I'm ready to do anything! With how strong I am now, I won't let you down, Commander!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Is there something that needs doing? I'll be happy to shoulder even a little bit of your burdens.
skins.secretaryTouch: Hehe, how about I be the one to give you a shoulder massage this time?

skins.shipDescription: It's summer~! Summer is here, Commander! Let's head down to the beach to play! I'll show you why I'm feared in water gun fights!
skins.acquisition: It's summer~! Summer is here, Commander! Let's head down to the beach to play! I'll show you why I'm feared in water gun fights!
skins.login: Commander, summer is finally here, so why such a long face~? Let's enjoy some fun in the sun on the beach~?
skins.details: This is no simple inner tube, Commander. It also doubles as "ammunition storage" for my water gun! How 'bout it? Wanna taste my waterpower~?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Just because it's hot doesn't mean you should stay cooped up underneath the air conditioner all day. Let's play outside~!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, you should also get a tan! That way, we'll match~? Ehehe~!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: C-Commander... that place doesn't need any sunscreen...

skins.shipDescription: Hey! Over here! Hehe. I didn't expect to run into you at school, Commander. What are you doing here?
skins.acquisition: Hey! Over here! Hehe. I didn't expect to run into you at school, Commander. What are you doing here?
skins.login: I'll be bringing the heat at school today!
skins.details: School life is all about running track under the warm sun, am I right!?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, you should get us some more phys ed classes! I mean... exercise is really important!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Listening to music is a real good way to calm your mind when you wanna relax! Let's listen together, Commander.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Huh? Forbin's heading this way with a pile of notebooks? Um, is there a good hiding place around here¡ª
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: I don't need a massage right now...
